content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 33, "index": 14}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 32}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 37}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. I have 4 blackstone in slot 15, so I will move one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 33, "index": 14}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 32}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 37}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: I have moved one blackstone to slot 1, and now need to move another to slot 2. I will move one from slot 15.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 33, "index": 14}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 32}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 37}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move another blackstone to slot 4, to the right of the blackstone in slot 1. I will move one from slot 15.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 33, "index": 14}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 32}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 37}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to move the last blackstone to slot 5, to the right of the blackstone in slot 4. I will move it from slot 15.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "tropical_fish_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 33, "index": 14}, {"type": "chain_command_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 17}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 55, "index": 32}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 58, "index": 37}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "husk_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the polished_blackstone, I need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
